com.munger.passwordkeeper.view

Class ViewFileFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.ViewFileFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ViewFileFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment used to view all the defined entries in a passwordDocument.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ViewFileFragment.DetailListAdapter
      Class the populates the specified ListView with a collections of DetailsViews.
      private static class  ViewFileFragment.DetailView
      Modifies the existing TextWidget class to render its assigned details

      • searchDetails

        private java.util.ArrayList<PasswordDetails> searchDetails(java.util.ArrayList<PasswordDetails> details,
                                                 java.lang.String search)
        Filter the list of detials down to matching details. Detail names are the only thing search. Matches detail names that contain the search string anywhere in the string.
        Parameters:
        details - the list of details to filter
        search - the search string to filter on.
        Returns:
        the filtered list of details
